title: Rekindling Connections
description: Do we ever find our soul mate? Zara enters the world of sports therapy taking her from middle class suburbia to the heady testosterone world of the Olympic arena, where a new life beckons in sunny & hip Los Angeles. Her search for a life partner is problematic. Who is the right one? Tyler the devilishly good looking but arrogant Polo player or his younger competitor Brett. With his wild sense of adventure and a wicked mischievous streak that attracts Zara's eyes as he dips in and out of her fast paced life. A new job in LA introduces a new element to the status quo. Bruce the chosen one dependable, seriously rich, his pedigree impeccable allows Zara to enter the world of high society. Does Zara make the right choice or does life have its own game plan.
author: Nicky Abell-Francis
